item.title: Fixed
item.dc:creator: @E_d_e_n1 E_d_e_n
item.description:
@E_d_e_n1 wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:2, topic:400261”][quote author=E_d_e_n link=topic=497333.msg3636691#msg3636691 date=1308646392]
like the buttons that allow you to view logout, inventory, stats, settings tab…? those buttons how do i remove or add one of these server sided?

Also

When you click attack, follow, on a player how do i edit what happens when you click them what package is it handled in?
found it lol, still need top answer please
[/quote]

In the login method server side, look for the setSidebar codes.[/quote]
thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Fixed
